header.subtitle: JavaExplorer
header.notice: Jesktop documentation is under construction. Everything you can find outside this page is to be considered obsolete.

s1.title: JavaExplorer
s1.p: A zip of the source for JavaExplorer : JavaExplorer_JesktopSrc.zip - 785K.
An installable jar of JavaExplorer : JavaExplorer_Jesktop.jar - 718K (don't forget to right click / save-as in Netscape).

s1.title: Main JavaExplorer Site
s1.p: Please visit the home page for JavaExplorer application: http://sourceforge.net/projects/javaexplorer/
